resources.string: Drag your file here or upload it from your COMPUTER
Give Bankodemia permission to use the camera. Make sure you have good light and focus well on your document from the front.
Now, we will verify your identity to protect your account.
You will need to upload a photo of your INE or valid passport and take a selfie. If you are a foreigner you will need a picture of your immigration document (FM3).
Selected the type of document to be photographed
Learn how we protect your documents
You will use it to log in to the app and confirm your transactions.
Use at least 6 alphanumeric characters, not consecutive or repeated.
Wait a moment, we are sending your data
You\'re done! We received your information. It usually takes a few minutes to verify, but if you have any problems, we will contact you.
